title: Why PHP Usage Has Declined by 40% in Just Over 2 Years
author: Richard MacManus
description: PHP popularity has dropped dramatically, coinciding with WordPress becoming "JavaScript-first" according to its co-creator Matt Mullenweg.
cntitle: PHP 使用率在短短 2 年内下降 40% 的原因
cndescription: PHP 的受欢迎程度大幅下降，据其联合创始人 Matt Mullenweg 所说，这与 WordPress 成为“JavaScript 优先”相吻合。
